parameter.name: doorbirdHost
parameter.label: Host
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of Doorbird

parameter.name: imageRefreshRate
parameter.label: Image Refresh Rate
parameter.description: Image refresh rate in seconds (blank to disable)

parameter.name: doorbellOffDelay
parameter.label: Doorbell Off Delay
parameter.description: Delay to set doorbell channel OFF after doorbell event (blank to disable)

parameter.name: motionOffDelay
parameter.label: Motion Off Delay
parameter.description: Delay to set motion channel OFF after motion event (blank to disable)

parameter.name: montageNumImages
parameter.label: Montage Number of Images
parameter.description: Number of images to include in history montage

parameter.name: montageScaleFactor
parameter.label: Montage Scale Factor
parameter.description: Scaling factor to apply to history montage
